aors.controller
Class InitialState

java.lang.Object
  aors.controller.InitialState

public class InitialState
extends java.lang.Object

This objects contains necessarily data about the initial simulation state. NOTE: do not change the fields form this class since some of them are referenced via reflection, therefore without a right check this will lead in logical and runtime errors.

Since:
July 26, 2009

classForName

public java.lang.Class<?> classForName(java.lang.String packageAndClassName)
Get the class context for an given packageAndClass name. This is required for being able to create any dynamic instances inside the simulator from outside (modules like InitialStateUI module)

Parameters:
packageAndClassName -
Returns:
